description:
Tree works subject to TPO 44/45 Newington Green No. 244 2002:

Beech (T1) : Prune as specified in letter from Quaife Woodlands dated 16/01/03.
Mulberry (T2) : Prune as specified in letter from Quaife Woodlands dated 16/01/03.
Sycamore (T3) : Crown lift.
Lime (T4) : Prune north side only to facilitate clearance from building.
Sycamore (T5) : Crown lift.
Sycamore (T6) : Fell, subject to replacement.
Sycamore (T7) : Fell, subject to replacement.
Holly (T1) : Fell, subject to replacement.
Limes x 6 (G2) : Fell, subject to replacement.
Sycamores (G3) : Prune as specified in letter from Quaife Woodlands dated 16/01/03.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Within 12 calendar months of the removal of the tree a replacement tree shall be planted of an appropriate species and size agreed with the Local Planning Authority and in an agreed position to British Standard 4428: 1969 'General Landscape Operations'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
